Text.Name: 09_Appendix\03_DeveloperHints\_Text
Text.SourceText:
### Hints for developers
The following sections are not intended for the users of Altaxo, but rather for developers wanting to contribute to Altaxo.
```{Altaxo child="AltaxosUpdateInstaller\_Text"} Altaxo's update installer ```
```{Altaxo child="TheAddinSystem\_Text"} The addin system ```
